languages.text: {n}Арджента каменеет и оборачивается к вам. В ее взгляде — ярость, и изумление, и неизбывная горечь. На секунду ее лицо искажает гримаса, а потом Сестра битвы роняет голову, едва слышно шепча слова молитвы.{/n}

{n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента каменеет и оборачивается к вам. В ее взгляде — ярость, и изумление, и неизбывная горечь. На секунду ее лицо искажает гримаса, а потом Сестра битвы роняет голову, едва слышно шепча слова молитвы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta s'immobilise puis se tourne vers vous. Une terrible grimace déforme ses traits et ses yeux étincellent de rage, de stupéfaction et d'une peine incommensurable. Elle baisse la tête et commence à murmurer une prière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta s'immobilise puis se tourne vers vous. Une terrible grimace déforme ses traits et ses yeux étincellent de rage, de stupéfaction et d'une peine incommensurable. Elle baisse la tête et commence à murmurer une prière.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔愣在了原地，随后转过头，看着你。她的目光中充满了愤怒、惊讶与无尽的悲伤。有那么一瞬间，她的脸变得扭曲，但随后便低下了头，开始低声祈祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔愣在了原地，随后转过头，看着你。她的目光中充满了愤怒、惊讶与无尽的悲伤。有那么一瞬间，她的脸变得扭曲，但随后便低下了头，开始低声祈祷。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは凍りつき、あなたに向き直った。その目には怒りと驚き、そして果てしない悲しみがあふれている。彼女の顔は一瞬険しい表情にゆがんだが、やがて頭を下げ、祈りの言葉をささやき始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは凍りつき、あなたに向き直った。その目には怒りと驚き、そして果てしない悲しみがあふれている。彼女の顔は一瞬険しい表情にゆがんだが、やがて頭を下げ、祈りの言葉をささやき始めた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta erstarrt und blickt dich dann an. Du erkennst in ihren Augen, wie sich Wut, Erstaunen und unendliche Trauer vermischen. Sie verzieht kurz das Gesicht, doch dann senkt sie den Kopf und beginnt, ein Gebet zu flüstern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta erstarrt und blickt dich dann an. Du erkennst in ihren Augen, wie sich Wut, Erstaunen und unendliche Trauer vermischen. Sie verzieht kurz das Gesicht, doch dann senkt sie den Kopf und beginnt, ein Gebet zu flüstern.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se queda muy quieta y luego se vuelve hacia ti. Te mira con los ojos llenos de furia, incredulidad y una tristeza incontenible. Su rostro se contrae momentáneamente en una mueca, pero luego baja la cabeza y comienza a rezar en voz baja.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se queda muy quieta y luego se vuelve hacia ti. Te mira con los ojos llenos de furia, incredulidad y una tristeza incontenible. Su rostro se contrae momentáneamente en una mueca, pero luego baja la cabeza y comienza a rezar en voz baja.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta donakalıyor, ardından dönüp sana bakıyor. Hiddet, şaşkınlık ve bitmek bilmez bir kederin izleri, gözlerinden okunuyor. Bir anlığına yüzünü buruşturuyor, sonrasında kafasını eğip bir dua fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta freezes and then turns to face you. Her eyes are brimming with rage, astonishment, and unending sorrow. Her face momentarily twists into a grimace but then she drops her head and begins whispering words of prayer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta donakalıyor, ardından dönüp sana bakıyor. Hiddet, şaşkınlık ve bitmek bilmez bir kederin izleri gözlerinden okunuyor. Bir anlığına yüzünü buruşturuyor ancak kafasını eğip bir dua fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
